instructions: Tap Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls . To remove items in Control Center, tap the red icon next to an item, then tap Remove . To change the order of the items, tap and hold the three-line icon to the right. When the item rises up, drag it to a new location. To add new controls, tap the green icon to move the item to the Include section. Drag these new controls to the position you prefer. After you've made the changes you want, leave the screen. Your changes save automatically.
